v.v: The rebels stand deep in slaughter,
Their deeds will not allow them to turn to God,
The pride of Israel testifies against him;
They will go with their flocks and herds to seek Yahweh,
Ephraim will become a desolation on the day of punishment.
The leaders of Judah are like those who move a boundary stone.
So I will be like a moth to Ephraim,
So I will be like a lion to Ephraim,
I will go and return to my place,

v: Pay attention, house of Israel!
Listen, house of the king!
For judgment is coming against you all.
You have been a snare at Mizpah
and a net spread over Tabor.
but I will punish all of them.
and Israel is not hidden from me.
Ephraim, now you have become like a prostitute;
Israel is defiled.
for the mind of adultery is in them,
and they do not know Yahweh.
so Israel and Ephraim will stumble in their guilt;
and Judah also will stumble with them.
but they will not find him,
for he has withdrawn himself from them.
for they have borne illegitimate children.
Now the new moon festivals will devour them with their fields.
and the trumpet in Ramah.
Sound a battle cry at Beth Aven:
‘We will follow you, Benjamin!’
Among the tribes of Israel I have declared what is certain to happen.
I will pour my wrath on them like water.
he is crushed in judgment,
because he has willingly walked after idols.
and like rot to the house of Judah.
and Judah saw his wound,
then Ephraim went to Assyria,
and Judah sent messengers to the great king.
But he was not able to cure you people
or heal your wound.
and like a young lion to the house of Judah.
I, even I, will tear and go away;
I will carry them off,
and there will be no one to rescue them.
until they acknowledge their guilt and seek my face,
until they earnestly seek me in their distress.”
